tool_description: Generates return authorization numbers and initiates return requests based on customer information, order details, and return policies.

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer requesting the return

order_id.description: Original order identifier containing the items to be returned

return_reason.description: Reason for return: defective, wrong_size, wrong_item, not_as_described, changed_mind, damaged_shipping

items_to_return.description: Array of product SKUs being returned

error_messages: Invalid customer ID: Customer not found in system database.
Invalid order ID: Order not found or does not belong to specified customer.
Return window expired: Items are past the allowed return period.
Invalid return reason: Must be one of [defective, wrong_size, wrong_item, not_as_described, changed_mind, damaged_shipping].
Items not returnable: One or more items are marked as non-returnable in product catalog.
Invalid urgency level: Must be one of [standard, expedited, urgent].
usage: Provide customer_id, order_id, return_reason, and items_to_return array. Optionally specify return_urgency. Tool validates eligibility and generates return authorization.

authorization_status.description: Status of authorization: approved, pending, denied

return_deadline.description: Deadline for completing the return process
